sentences.sContent: Like his father, he hopes to become a naval aviator.
sentences.sContent_eng: Like his father, he hopes to become a naval aviator.
sentences.sCn: 与父亲一样，他希望成为海军飞行员。

sentences.sContent: The Man Angel was lighter-than-air and had paddles like a rowboat that the aviator could pump.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Man Angel was lighter-than-air and had paddles like a rowboat that the aviator could pump.
sentences.sCn: “人类天使”比空气还轻，并且有着类似于小船的桨，飞行员可以驱动这些桨。

sentences.sContent: Air Chief Marshal Glenn Torpy told the graduates: "This is probably one of the most significant milestones in an aviator's career.
sentences.sContent_eng: Air Chief Marshal Glenn Torpy told the graduates: "This is probably one of the most significant milestones in an aviator's career.
sentences.sCn: 空军上将格伦•托比在毕业典礼上致辞说：“这可能是飞行员职业生涯中最重要的里程碑之一。
